title: My Perm Ban.
body:
Aprox. 8 hours ago i was permanantly banned during an ARAM game.
The Situation: my friend and a random got into a fairly heated and toxic argument in the game before. we jumped into another ARAM and the Random player was on our team. the player was being toxic and started another fight with my friend. i Tried to diffuse the argument with the player. the player then set his sights on me. he began harrassing me and just pushing me until i retaliated.  to my Dismay i had a bad day at work (not relevant i know), but the players harrassment got to me and i snapped and threw a toxic comment at him in retaliation (again not the right thing to do). This being a Perm ban on my Second offense with no previous warnings besides my first 14 day Ban. And now my account ive put 4 seasons into is Perm Banned. While i Personally feel that the Immediate Perm ban was a bit extreme i understand that, thats the way its going to be.

I would like this to be a lesson. Don't Retaliate. Don't try and stop an argument. and just mute people. I would like to one day get my Account back. but i know this is more than likely impossible.

And to you Mr. Clashy while you where not a very nice person i do appologize for being a dick. 

Sincerly
DoctorTruss
Kinda toxic but not really.

Given the situation it might be worth appealing to have it reduced to a 14 day ban (no guarantees of course). It depends largely on what that toxic comment was, and what your history looks like. If you skipped straight to a 14 day ban before it seems likely you were using zero tolerance language (racism, hate speech, suicide encouragement etc), and if that was also the case here then they definitely won't reverse the ban.
